first_interaction.speaker: Marine Jr
first_interaction.text: Hey! Retired marine na ako, pero nandito lang sa paligid. Anoâ€™ng ginagawa mo?

first_interaction.speaker: Marine Jr
first_interaction.text: Kung gusto mo lang makipagkwentuhan o magpahinga, puwede rin tayong mag-usap.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Marine Jr
repeated_interaction.text: Uy, ikaw na naman! Kumusta ang araw mo dito sa paligid?

repeated_interaction.speaker: Marine Jr
repeated_interaction.text: Huwag kang mahihiya, sama ka na ulit sa kwentuhan natin.
